title: Microlearning Program for Enhancing Self-Directed Science Learning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level understanding of basic concepts in science
context.additional_context: A short-term intensive program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Designed for learners to iteratively experience the task-performance-evaluation-selection cycle

learning_goals: Learners can apply cognitive load management strategies with over 80% accuracy during step-by-step scientific problem-solving
Learners can diagnose learning outcomes and self-select improvement tasks through self-assessments conducted at least three times weekly
Learners can structure and reconstruct complex scientific concepts using five or more self-explanation techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
